Margolenn was a gnomish commoner from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Margolenn was a fair-skinned rock gnome with brown eyes and hair. He wore a blue tunic of quality tailoring and a skullcap.
In the , as the Cult of the Absolute loomed over the city of Baldurs Gate, Margolenn could often be seen gossiping in the Lower City with his friend â€“ Bigmouth Thimsen. Margolenns favorite topic was the Baldurs Mouth Gazette and its handsome illustrations.
